title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 1.8 - Interest of certain persons in purchases prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 1.8 - Interest of certain persons in purchases prohibited

State Regulations

No manager, trustee or other officer of any State charitable
or other institution, receiving moneys from the State treasury for the
maintenance or support in whole or in part of such institution, shall be
interested in any purchase or sale by any of such officers. (State Finance Law, ยง109.)

Notes

1.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
